parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Sketch relation as defined in swSketchRelationFilterType_e

title: ISketchRelationManager.IGetRelations
description: Gets all of the sketch relations in the sketch based on the specified filter.
signature:
SketchRelation IGetRelations( 
   System.Int32
Filter
,
   System.Int32
Count
)

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Sketch relation as defined in swSketchRelationFilterType_e

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of sketch relations VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Because some of the objects may be NULL, you should check for this before accessing them. You should deallocate on any dynamically allocated memory.
Call
ISketchRelationManager::GetRelationsCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
